revised_title: A New Mode of Respiration in Myriapoda: The Scutigerids' Respiratory System
tldr: The author, F.G. Sinclair, discovers a new mode of respiration in Myriapoda, specifically in Scutigerids, through a series of organs with tubes that aerate the blood before it returns to the heart. This mode of respiration is intermediate between the tracheae of Myriapods and the lungs of Spiders.
